  • 方法详细资料

    • sqlUserQuery

      List<vss.common.User> sqlUserQuery​(String sql, String[] paras)
      This method is used to update the database
      参数:
      sql - is an SQL statement that operates on the database which ddta is ?.
      paras - The elements in Paras will replace the ? in SQL statement in order.
      返回:
      List if users

    • sqlBookQuery

      List<vss.common.Book> sqlBookQuery​(String sql, String[] paras)
      This method is used to update the database
      参数:
      sql - is an SQL statement that operates on the database which ddta is ?.
      paras - The elements in Paras will replace the ? in SQL statement in order.
      返回:
      When operating success return true, otherwise return false.

      参数:
      sql - is an SQL statement that operates on the database which ddta is ?.
      paras - The elements in Paras will replace the ? in SQL statement in order.
      返回:
      A list of books.

    • sqlUpdate

      boolean sqlUpdate​(String sql, String[] paras)
      This method is used to query relational tables.
      参数:
      sql - is an SQL statement that operates on the database which ddta is ?.
      paras - The elements in Paras will replace the ? in SQL statement in order.
      返回:
      A String list of bookID or courseID.
